# include<bits/stdc++.h>
# define LL long long int

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	LL T , N , K;
	for (cin>>T;T--;)
	{
		cin>>N>>K;
		if (K > N-K)
		        K = N-K;
		LL ans = 1LL,num=1LL,den=1LL;
		for (int i=0;i<K;i++)
		{
				ans *= ((N-i));
				ans /= (i+1);
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return (0);
}
